title: mlos_bench cli/globals common subschemas config
$comment: Includes common subschemas for both cli configs and globals.

tunable_params_map.description: Maps tunable_params to a set of covariant tunable groups.

experiment_id.description: The name of the experiment. Controls trial reuse and sometimes used to disambiguate certain resources definitions.  Note: changes to this value will result in a new experiment being created, which may be necessary upon certain config or script changes.

trial_id.description: Trial ID to use (or resume) for the experiment.

config_id.description: Config ID to use (or resume) for the experiment.
